message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the rest.  We can negotiate later if you're not happy.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. This round only!
Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 70%, you take 30%.  We both get more than in the previous round.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. I'm dropping my ask to 60%. Take it or I'm going even higher next round!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  This is my final offer before the inflation really starts to hurt us both.
